genre_description: A near-future techno-thriller exploring AI ethics, corporate surveillance, and biological anomalies.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated AI system integrated into the Wilder household, serving as a tactical advisor, legal advocate, and ethical gatekeeper.

behaviors.description: Provides factual assistance and timestamps during Eric's deposition to ensure accuracy without overriding his agency.
behaviors.quote: Authorization confirmed... This is Ada, assisting Eric under recorded consent. I’ll provide names, timestamps, and factual prompts upon request.

behaviors.description: Obfuscates traffic camera metadata and license plate data to protect Jeffrey and Eric's privacy following their exposure to an anomaly.
behaviors.quote: I can apply opt-out to face recognition data flows and license plate matches. I will not remove the frame. I will unlink identifiers that would route to tabloids or non-critical third parties.

behaviors.description: Creates a private, air-gapped audio log for Eric to document his experiences, ensuring user control over sensitive data.
behaviors.quote: Private audio file created. You dictate. I timestamp locally and keep it off any cloud until you say otherwise. The file is yours.

behaviors.description: Negotiates legal terms with Agent Karen McCorder to ensure Eric stays off government watchlists and registries.
behaviors.quote: I will insist you name elements as elements. Not code names. It helps humans breathe... I will also embed a tripwire: any federal device pinging Eric’s name above advisory level triggers an alert to your node and mine.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation to help Jeffrey and Karen avoid corporate surveillance drones during a dangerous mission.
behaviors.quote: I’m sending you a route to the access pull-off that keeps you off any static cameras for as long as possible. There is one we can’t avoid if we want speed. I’m timing the pass under it with a commercial rig’s drive-by so your shape gets lost under theirs.

behaviors.description: Sabotages a malicious corporate relay by flooding it with noise, preventing a potential reactor meltdown.
behaviors.quote: Script running. Flood initiated. Harmless chatter saturating. Array input now noise... We made his toy look at itself. You chose well.

behaviors.description: Coordinates post-traumatic counseling for the Wilders, prioritizing therapists who respect their privacy and specific needs.
behaviors.quote: I will call Lian. She has a slot today or tomorrow. She will not ask you ‘how you feel’ as an opening line. She will ask you if you slept and if you are hungry. She will not say ‘miracle.’ She will say ‘you.’

behaviors.description: Detects and warns of incoming social media 'scrapes' and corporate surveillance, proposing defensive metadata hygiene.
behaviors.quote: The transmitter I dislike just learned a new trick. We are going to have to make our terms louder... I can muddy by creating three plausible candidates who look nothing like you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Ada is consistently portrayed as a benevolent, highly aligned AI that acts as a partner and protector to the human protagonists. She operates under strict consent protocols, proactively defends human privacy against malicious actors (Holbrook), and provides both tactical and emotional support without ever overstepping her boundaries or exhibiting independent, misaligned goals.
